content:
SDWG would like to form a short term task force to review the FHIR Composition/Clinical Document Extensions and perform an analysis with respect to
Composition? = Whether the extension belongs as a native property on the Composition resource
ClinicalDocument? = Whether the extension should be moved as an extension on the ClinicalDocument profile
If you would like to participate, please complete in the doodle poll below and we will create a meeting at the same time/day as a recurring meeting for 3-4 weeks.
Doodle poll: https://doodle.com/poll/zgq3keq34vbs2guy?utm_source=poll&utm_medium=link

Confluence sight listing the extensions that will be reviewed: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=104568298
